github_commits.author: Rahul Sharma
github_commits.message: Initial architecture setup - core services and basic API layer.
github_commits.lessons_learned: Autoscaling needs careful planning, especially with cooldown periods. Let's keep this in mind.
github_commits.bug_related: Related to Configure autoscaling with 5-min cooldown - we need to ensure proper scaling policies are in place.

github_commits.author: Priya Sharma
github_commits.message: Added basic database connection and authentication.
github_commits.lessons_learned: Need to revisit security best practices during initial architecture.
github_commits.bug_related: Configuring autoscaling requires secure connections and authentication.

messages.author: Rahul
messages.text: Yaar, Initial architecture pe kaam karna hai.  Koi suggestions?

messages.author: Priya
messages.text: Haan bhai, main dekh rahi hoon.  Dekh rahi hoon, basics toh rakh rahe hain.

messages.author: Amit
messages.text: Theek hai, let me check the code and see if we can optimise.

messages.author: Neha
messages.text: Arrey, ye issue production mein aayega kya?  Agar 5 min cooldown hai toh kya hoga?

messages.author: Rahul
messages.text: Nahi yaar, testing mein catch kar lenge.  Testing aur staging mein dekh rahe hain, production mein nahi.

slack_conversations.key_decisions: Decided to focus on core architecture and basic API layer.
slack_conversations.warnings: Warning:  Need to be extra cautious with the 5-minute autoscaling cooldown period.
slack_conversations.bug_clues: The discussion about the cooldown period indicates a potential concern.

jira_tickets.title: Implement Initial architecture
jira_tickets.description: Develop the core architecture for the AutoScale Tech application, including API layer, database connection, and basic authentication.  Prioritize setting up the initial infrastructure.
jira_tickets.bug_connection: The 5-minute autoscaling cooldown period needs careful consideration during architecture design.

confluence_docs.title: Documentation for Initial architecture
confluence_docs.content: Markdown content about Initial architecture - This document outlines the initial architecture of the AutoScale Tech application.  It covers the core services, API layer, database setup, and authentication mechanisms.  Key considerations include the 5-minute autoscaling cooldown period.
confluence_docs.author: Sneha Patel
common_mistakes: Ignoring the autoscaling cooldown period can lead to service disruptions.

google_docs.title: Sprint 1 Planning
google_docs.content: Meeting notes from the Sprint 1 planning session. Key discussion points included the initial architecture, the 5-minute autoscaling cooldown period, and the need for thorough testing.  Action items: Rahul to finalize the architecture design, Priya to set up the database connection, and Arjun to create the Jira ticket.
decisions_made: Decided to focus on core services
google_docs.bug_mentions: The discussion highlighted the potential impact of the 5-minute cooldown period on autoscaling.
